name: Spotspot
description: SpotSpot is a Chrome extension that scans your current webpage such as job listings, emails, or event invites - and automatically highlights relevant U.S. states or cities on a map. Whether you're job hunting, planning travel, or just curious, SpotSpot turns vague location mentions into instant visual context.

name: Little Lemon Restaurant
description: Little Lemon App is a React Native capstone project built for the Meta Front-End Developer course. It simulates a mobile food ordering experience for a Mediterranean restaurant based in Chicago. The app features a full onboarding flow with SQLite-based profile persistence, dynamic menu browsing from a remote API, and category-based filtering. It also includes image upload, custom fonts, and a Mediterranean-inspired UI. Designed with modular components and Expo tooling, the project showcases practical mobile architecture and local data handling

name: K-Detector
description: K-Detector is a lightweight React-based web app designed to simulate object detection logic in a playful, beginner-friendly format. Built with modular components and clean separation of concerns, the project emphasizes maintainable architecture and dynamic rendering. It features a custom UI flow inspired by scientific exploration, with interactive elements that demonstrate state management and conditional logic. Ideal for showcasing frontend fundamentals and creative problem framing.
